13  package net.sf.oval.expression;
14  
15  import groovy.lang.Binding;
16  import groovy.lang.GroovyShell;
17  import groovy.lang.Script;
18  
19  import java.util.Map;
20  import java.util.Map.Entry;
21  
22  import net.sf.oval.exception.ExpressionEvaluationException;
23  import net.sf.oval.internal.Log;
24  import net.sf.oval.internal.util.ObjectCache;
25  import net.sf.oval.internal.util.ThreadLocalObjectCache;
26  
27  /**
28   * @author Sebastian Thomschke
29   */
30  public class ExpressionLanguageGroovyImpl implements ExpressionLanguage
31  {
32  	private static final Log LOG = Log.getLog(ExpressionLanguageGroovyImpl.class);
33  
34  	private static final GroovyShell GROOVY_SHELL = new GroovyShell();
35  
36  	private final ThreadLocalObjectCache<String, Script> threadScriptCache = new ThreadLocalObjectCache<String, Script>();
37  
38  	/**
39  	 * {@inheritDoc}
40  	 */
41  	public Object evaluate(final String expression, final Map<String, ? > values) throws ExpressionEvaluationException
42  	{
43  		try
44  		{
45  			final ObjectCache<String, Script> scriptCache = threadScriptCache.get();
46  			Script script = scriptCache.get(expression);
47  			if (script == null)
48  			{
49  				script = GROOVY_SHELL.parse(expression);
50  				scriptCache.put(expression, script);
51  			}
52  
53  			final Binding binding = new Binding();
54  			for (final Entry<String, ? > entry : values.entrySet())
55  			{
56  				binding.setVariable(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue());
57  			}
58  			LOG.debug("Evaluating Groovy expression: {1}", expression);
59  			script.setBinding(binding);
60  			return script.run();
61  		}
62  		catch (final Exception ex)
63  		{
64  			throw new ExpressionEvaluationException("Evaluating script with Groovy failed.", ex);
65  		}
66  	}
67  
68  	/**
69  	 * {@inheritDoc}
70  	 */
71  	public boolean evaluateAsBoolean(final String expression, final Map<String, ? > values)
72  			throws ExpressionEvaluationException
73  	{
74  		final Object result = evaluate(expression, values);
75  
76  		if (!(result instanceof Boolean))
77  		{
78  			throw new ExpressionEvaluationException("The script must return a boolean value.");
79  		}
80  		return (Boolean) result;
81  	}
82  }
